frontmatter.title: ROS2 Bridge for the HoloOcean Underwater Robotics Simulator
frontmatter.description: Access HoloOcean Thruster Control and ImagingSonar data from ROS2

`,(0,e.jsx)(n.h2,{id:"introduction",children:"Introduction"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.p,{children:`We have been working with robotics simulation for over 5 years.
We have used all the major robotics simulation solutions that are available for ROS: Gazebo, Webots and NVIDIA Isaac Sim.
We also built custom vehicle simulators for WayRay's Holographic AR Display system based on Carla, Unreal and the Godot Engine.`}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.p,{children:"But we never did look at simulation for Maritime Robotics, specifically simulation for Autonomous Underwater Vehicles (AUVs)."}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.p,{children:"Until now."}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.h2,{id:"research-project",children:"Research Project"}),`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(n.p,{children:[`A discussion with a client prospect prompted us to do some research into Maritime Robotics simulation.
While Gazebo also has maritime robotics simulation capabilities, we found another interesting open-source
simulator named `,(0,e.jsx)(n.a,{href:"https://holoocean.readthedocs.io",children:"HoloOcean"}),". It was developed by ",(0,e.jsx)(n.a,{href:"https://frostlab.byu.edu/",children:"BYU FrostLab"}),`
and has a number of nice features:`]}),`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(n.ul,{children:[`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(n.li,{children:["Built on ",(0,e.jsx)(n.a,{href:"https://github.com/BYU-PCCL/holodeck",children:"Holodeck"})," (and by proxy on Unreal Engine 4)"]}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:"Supports multi-agent missions and various underwater sensors including imaging sonar."}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:"Provides an easy to use Python API"}),`
`]}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.p,{children:"We decided to create a ROS2 Bridge for HoloOcean while we explore its capabilities."}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.h2,{id:"the-result",children:"The Result"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.p,{children:"We have just released the initial version of our ROS2 Bridge."}),`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(n.p,{children:["Check out our demo video on ",(0,e.jsx)(n.a,{href:"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kyBcfZYSLzc",children:"Youtube"}),"."]}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.p,{children:"The main features are:"}),`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(n.ul,{children:[`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:"ROS2 bridge using rclpy and the HoloOcean Python API"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:"Thruster control using ROS2 messages"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:"Basic URDF file for the HoveringAUV vehicle based on the Unreal Engine simulation"}),`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(n.li,{children:["Converts ImagingSonar data to PointCloud messages",`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(n.ul,{children:[`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:"Uses a PyBind-based C++ module to handle the conversion"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:"Runs the conversion on a background thread to reduce simulation delays"}),`
`]}),`
`]}),`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(n.li,{children:["Docker and Virtualenv based development environment (see ",(0,e.jsx)(n.a,{href:"https://github.com/migeran/holoocean_tools",children:"holoocean_tools"}),")"]}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:"Demo application with Rviz visualization"}),`
`]}),`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(n.p,{children:["The source code is available on ",(0,e.jsx)(n.a,{href:"https://github.com/migeran/holoocean_ros",children:"Github"}),"."]}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.h2,{id:"future-work",children:"Future Work"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.p,{children:`While it is already possible to control the AUV from ROS and to receive ImagingSonar data as
standard PointCloud messages, there is still more work left for the future:`}),`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(n.ul,{children:[`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:"Implement ROS2 Control Hardware Interface"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:"Implement more sensors"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:"Allow handling more agents at the same time"}),`
`]}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.h2,{id:"happy-to-connect--collaborate",children:"Happy to Connect & Collaborate"}),`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(n.p,{children:["We are always happy to answer any questions that you may have. Do not hesitate to reach out to us on our ",(0,e.jsx)(n.a,{href:"https://migeran.com/contact",children:"website"}),`.
We also would be delighted to review (and hopefully merge!) any Pull Requests with more features added to the ROS2 Bridge.`]}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.p,{children:"We would be also more than happy to work on similar (or completely different!) robotics simulation projects."}),`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(n.p,{children:[(0,e.jsx)(n.a,{href:"https://migeran.com/contact",children:"Do reach out to us"}),", if you need a capable team of robotics engineers to take your project to the next level."]}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.h2,{id:"about-migeran",children:"About Migeran"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.p,{children:"Migeran is a full-service software engineering and consulting company. In the past 16 years, we have been delivering software projects for our clients in a large variety of markets using a broad set of technologies, including:"}),`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(n.ul,{children:[`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:"Robotics solutions based on ROS1 and ROS2"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:"AR / VR solutions based on Godot Engine and Unreal Engine"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:"Native and cross-platform mobile apps built in Java / Kotlin, Swift / Objective-C and JavaScript / TypeScript with React Native."}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:"Business applications based on Web and Mobile frontends and Java, Python, Ruby and PHP backend"}),`
`]}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.p,{children:"Our first own product, Migeran for iOS was acquired by Intel in 2015 and released as the Multi-OS Engine."}),`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(n.p,{children:["We are available for new projects, you may ",(0,e.jsx)(n.a,{href:"/contact",children:"contact us"})," if you would like to learn more or have a project that you would like to discuss with us."]})]})}}var R=v;function O(o,i){throw new Error("Expected "+(i?"component":"object")+" `"+o+"` to be defined: you likely forgot to import, pass, or provide it.")}return y(S);})();
